mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.order_time AS order_time, o.delivery_status AS delivery_status, o.invoice_number AS invoice_number, o.member_id AS member_id, MAX(pay.actual_payment_amount) AS actual_payment_amount, MAX(prod.product_image) AS product_image, MAX(prod.product_name) AS product_name FROM products prod INNER JOIN detailed_order_items d ON prod.product_id = d.product_id INNER JOIN payments pay ON d.order_no = pay.order_no INNER JOIN order_history o ON pay.order_no = o.order_no WHERE member_id = 'abc1234' GROUP BY o.order_no;
select order_no from order_history where member_id = #{memberId}
